iso1Part4_ChargingMode.description: Indication for testing either AC or DC charging mode

iso1Part4_IdentificationMode.description: Indication for testing either EIM or PnC identification mode

iso1Part4_PlugType.description: Indication for testing either type1 or type2 plug type

iso1Part4_CableCapabilityACType.description: Indication for used AC cable type Choice: i) capability13A, ii) capability20A, iii) capability32A, iv) capability63A, v) capability70A

iso1Part4_EIMDone.description: Indication for initiating EIM Authorization process Choice: i) beforePlugin, ii) afterPlugin, iii) duringSlac, iv) v2gAuthorization

iso1Part4_ZeroPow.description: Indication for enabling a PmaxScheduleList with a list element pMax = 0W (triggering pause) Choice: i) sleepWithoutCharge, ii) sleepAfterCharge, iii) none_

iso1Part4_PkiType.description: Indication for selected PKI Choice: i) PKI_1, ii) PKI_2, iii) PKI_3, iv) PKI_4, v) PKI_5, vi) PKI_6, vii) PKI_7

IEC_61851_States.description: Indication for explicit testing of State C/D of IEC 61851‚Äê1:2017, Annex A during charging

par_CMN_MaxEntriesSAScheduleTuple.description: Maximum of SA Schedule tupple entries

PICS_CMN_CMN_CombinedTesting.description: Indication for enabling combined testing including SLAC association & V2G messaging - PLC_SLAC test operation ISO15118-5

PICS_CMN_CMN_WakeUp.description: Indication for the sleep time within a paused session

PICS_SECC_CMN_Pause.description: Indication for enabling a charging pause

PICS_CMN_CMN_V2gtpSdp.description: Indication for explicit testing V2GTP by using SDP payload

PICS_CMN_CMN_V2gtpV2g.description: Indication for explicit testing V2GTP by using V2G payload

PICS_CMN_CMN_Renegotiation.description: Indication for explicit testing V2GTP by using V2G payload

PICS_CMN_CMN_RenegotiationLoopIndication.description: Indicates the iteration of the ChargingStatus (AC) or CurrentDemand (DC) loop, when ReNegotiation shall be triggered (shall be smaller or equal to PICS_CMN_CMN_LoopCounter).

PICS_CMN_CMN_LoopCounter.description: Indicates the number of iterations of the ChargingStatus (AC) or CurrentDemand (DC) loop

PICS_CMN_CMN_InvalidV2gtpDataFields.description: Indication for enabling Test Group: Invalid V2GTP data fields

PICS_CMN_CMN_SDPTimeoutsAndInvalidData.description: Indication for enabling Test Group: SDP Timeouts and invalid SDP data fields

PICS_CMN_CMN_FailedResponseCodes.description: Indication for enabling Test Group: V2G fAILED response codes

PICS_CMN_CMN_V2gTimeouts.description: Indication for enabling Test Group: V2G timeouts

PICS_SECC_DC_WeldingDetection.description: Indication for explicit testing of WeldingDetection

PICS_SECC_CMN_DepartureTime.description: Indication for using a departure time

PICS_SECC_CMN_MaxEntriesSAScheduleTuple.description: Indication for enabling a maximal number of entries in the SAScheduleTuple

PICS_EVCC_CMN_ReceiptRequired.description: Indication for explicit testing of MeteringReceipt message

PICS_EVCC_CMN_InvalidStatesAndDutyCycles.description: Indication for enabling Test Group: Invalid states and duty cycles

PICS_EVCC_CMN_InvalidV2GMessages.description: Indication for enabling Test Group: Invalid V2G messages
